<a id="GraphFrame"></a>

# GraphFrame

**Experimental:** This class may be changed or removed in future versions.

**Inherits:** [GraphElement](GraphElement.md) **\<** [Container](Container.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

GraphFrame is a special [GraphElement](GraphElement.md) that can be used to organize other [GraphElement](GraphElement.md)\\ s inside a [GraphEdit](GraphEdit.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

GraphFrame is a special [GraphElement](GraphElement.md) to which other [GraphElement](GraphElement.md)\\ s can be attached. It can be configured to automatically resize to enclose all attached [GraphElement](GraphElement.md)\\ s. If the frame is moved, all the attached [GraphElement](GraphElement.md)\\ s inside it will be moved as well.

A GraphFrame is always kept behind the connection layer and other [GraphElement](GraphElement.md)\\ s inside a [GraphEdit](GraphEdit.md).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Signals

<a id="GraphFrame_signal_autoshrink_changed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**autoshrink_changed**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GraphFrame_signal_autoshrink_changed)

Emitted when [autoshrink_enabled](GraphFrame.md#GraphFrame_property_autoshrink_enabled) or [autoshrink_margin](GraphFrame.md#GraphFrame_property_autoshrink_margin) changes.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="GraphFrame_property_autoshrink_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **autoshrink_enabled** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#GraphFrame_property_autoshrink_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_autoshrink_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_autoshrink_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the frame's rect will be adjusted automatically to enclose all attached [GraphElement](GraphElement.md)\\ s.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GraphFrame_property_autoshrink_margin"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **autoshrink_margin** = `40` [ðŸ”—](#GraphFrame_property_autoshrink_margin)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_autoshrink_margin**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_autoshrink_margin**\ (\ )

The margin around the attached nodes that is used to calculate the size of the frame when [autoshrink_enabled](GraphFrame.md#GraphFrame_property_autoshrink_enabled) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GraphFrame_property_drag_margin"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **drag_margin** = `16` [ðŸ”—](#GraphFrame_property_drag_margin)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_drag_margin**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_drag_margin**\ (\ )

The margin inside the frame that can be used to drag the frame.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GraphFrame_property_tint_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](Color.md) **tint_color** = `Color(0.3, 0.3, 0.3, 0.75)` [ðŸ”—](#GraphFrame_property_tint_color)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_tint_color**\ (\ value\: [Color](Color.md)\ )
- [Color](Color.md) **get_tint_color**\ (\ )

The color of the frame when [tint_color_enabled](GraphFrame.md#GraphFrame_property_tint_color_enabled) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GraphFrame_property_tint_color_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **tint_color_enabled** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#GraphFrame_property_tint_color_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_tint_color_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_tint_color_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the tint color will be used to tint the frame.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GraphFrame_property_title"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **title** = `""` [ðŸ”—](#GraphFrame_property_title)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_title**\ (\ value\: [String](String.md)\ )
- [String](String.md) **get_title**\ (\ )

Title of the frame.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="GraphFrame_method_get_titlebar_hbox"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[HBoxContainer](HBoxContainer.md) **get_titlebar_hbox**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GraphFrame_method_get_titlebar_hbox)

Returns the [HBoxContainer](HBoxContainer.md) used for the title bar, only containing a [Label](Label.md) for displaying the title by default.

This can be used to add custom controls to the title bar such as option or close buttons.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Theme Property Descriptions

<a id="GraphFrame_theme_color_resizer_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](Color.md) **resizer_color** = `Color(0.875, 0.875, 0.875, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#GraphFrame_theme_color_resizer_color)

The color modulation applied to the resizer icon.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GraphFrame_theme_style_panel"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **panel** [ðŸ”—](#GraphFrame_theme_style_panel)

The default [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) used for the background of the **GraphFrame**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GraphFrame_theme_style_panel_selected"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **panel_selected** [ðŸ”—](#GraphFrame_theme_style_panel_selected)

The [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) used for the background of the **GraphFrame** when it is selected.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GraphFrame_theme_style_titlebar"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **titlebar** [ðŸ”—](#GraphFrame_theme_style_titlebar)

The [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) used for the title bar of the **GraphFrame**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GraphFrame_theme_style_titlebar_selected"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **titlebar_selected** [ðŸ”—](#GraphFrame_theme_style_titlebar_selected)

The [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) used for the title bar of the **GraphFrame** when it is selected.
